rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable APDM.APID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier for a single associated person, a group of associated persons, or a pool of associated persons. If APID identifies a pool, POOLDEF records must exist for each associated person.
datasetVariables.label: Associated Persons Identifier
datasetVariables.name: APID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Associated Persons Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable APDM.RSUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier for a related subject or pool of subjects. RSUBJID may be populated with the USUBJID of the related subject or the POOLID of the related pool.  RSUBJID will be null for data about associated persons who are related to the study but not to any study subjects.
datasetVariables.label: Related Subject
datasetVariables.name: RSUBJID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Associated Persons Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable APDM.RDEVID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier for a related device. RDEVID will be populated with the SPDEVID of the related device
datasetVariables.label: Related Device
datasetVariables.name: RDEVID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Associated Persons Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable APDM.SREL

datasetVariables.description: If RSUBJID is populated, describes the relationship of the associated person(s) identified in APID to the subject or pool identified in RSUBJID. If RDEVID is populated, describes the relationship of the associated person(s) identified in APID to the device identified in RDEVID.  If RSUBJID and RDEVID are null, SREL describes the relationship of the associated person(s) identified in APID to the study identified in STUDYID.
datasetVariables.label: Subject, Device or Study Relationship
datasetVariables.name: SREL

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Associated Persons Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable APDM.DTHDTC

datasetVariables.description: Date/time of death for any associated person who died, in ISO 8601 format. Should represent the date/time that is captured in the trial database.
datasetVariables.label: Date/Time of Death
datasetVariables.name: DTHDTC

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Associated Persons Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable APDM.DTHFL

datasetVariables.description: Indicates the associated person died. Should be Y or null. Should be populated if collected, even when the death date is unknown.
datasetVariables.label: Associated Persons Death Flag
datasetVariables.name: DTHFL

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable APDM.DMDTC

description: The demographics domain for those persons associated with the study itself, a particular study subject, or a device used in the study. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C132354, 2018-06-29)
label: Associated Persons Demographics
name: APDM
